ygData.subject: RE: Bard Petition
ygData.msgSnippet: LOL what i remember from beta during this was how HATED bards were (by casters at least), and how often i got told to GET AWAY because our songs were causing
ygData.messageBody:
LOL what i remember from beta during this was how HATED bards were (by
casters at least), and how often i got told to GET AWAY because our songs
were causing people to get interrupted while medding HAHAHA, it was funny.

Shada

>
> For a short time in beta this was the case. It was great
> when I would come
> upon a party in trouble I could buff/heal them with ease.
> Also people would
> always be hitching a ride on the Selo Train as I would cross
> the Karanas. I
> was saddened when they took this out.
>
> Rokenn Swiftsong - Karana server
> Master Brewer of Societus Argenti
> Amerginn - Test server
